name: Caldwell - The King is Dead by AJ Fernandez - Lonsdale
brand: Caldwell, The King is Dead by AJ Fernandez
additionalNotes: The King is Dead by AJF cigars are a collaboration between Robert Caldwell and AJ Fernandez— Two extremely talented cigar makers with a portfolio of highly rated blends. A very limited release that’s available in four popular sizes, these Nicaraguan puros exhibit an overall creamy sweetness, backed by full bodied notes of earth, espresso, and peppery spices.
